definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: The day after the misinformed spokesman made the announcements he had to take them all back.
sentences.chinese: 发言人误报消息的次日，他必须撤回所有的消息。

sentences.english: We bring all our soldiers home.
sentences.chinese: 我们把我们所有的士兵撤回来。

sentences.english: She made the mistake of smiling mockingly, saw his fist draw back.
sentences.chinese: 看到他的拳头撤回去，她犯了个错误，嘲讽地微笑着。

sentences.english: The painting will be withdrawn when it does not reach its reserve.
sentences.chinese: 当价格未达到最低拍卖价时画被撤回。

sentences.english: The Spartans withdrew their garrison from the Athenian Acropolis, and democracy was restored.
sentences.chinese: 斯巴达人从雅典卫城撤回驻军，民主得以恢复。

sentences.english: The commander countermanded the reinforcements to the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 司令员下令撤回派往战场的援军。

sentences.english: Magnus's army was gradually pushed back into a defensive circle.
sentences.chinese: 马格努斯的军队被迫逐步撤回防守圈。

sentences.english: They are now telling shareholders to reject the offer and withdraw their acceptances.
sentences.chinese: 他们现在正告诉股东们要拒绝收购并且撤回交易。

sentences.english: No central bank is about to withdraw any emergency measures.
sentences.chinese: 也没有哪国央行即将撤回任何的应急措施。

sentences.english: Even if the militia battles dint no, also can by ship withdraw.
sentences.chinese: 即使陆军作战不力，也可以乘船撤回来。

sentences.english: Rescue helicopters sent early this morning retrieved 34 workers.
sentences.chinese: 今天清晨派去的救援直升飞机撤回了34名工作人员。

sentences.english: Make pre-authorized withdrawals without penalty on a limited basis.
sentences.chinese: 经授权的支票撤回在规定范围内没有处罚。

sentences.english: Instant retraction of messages and attachments even after the message has been read.
sentences.chinese: 即使邮件内容已被阅读，也可即时撤回邮件和附件。

sentences.english: The enemy attacked in great numbers but our soldiers stood their ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们的前哨被迫撤回，预示敌人即将大举进攻。

sentences.english: At no point did Penguin, the original publisher, withdraw the book.
sentences.chinese: 最初的出版商企鹅书局无条件撤回了图书。

definition: to withdraw/to leave/to retreat/to pull out
to return (an item)/to send back/to go back
to cease/to suspend/to break off/to stop/to discontinue
variant of 撤銷|撤销[che4 xiao1]
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to give up defending/to yield/to surrender
to retreat and defend/to withdraw and maintain one's guard
